root: ^Haha! It is me indeed! And you can see that I'm still in good shape.
^Indeed, it's almost miraculous at this point.
^Come on, come on, let's not exaggerate, I had a good time anyway.
^But please, be kind and stop with your fire-breathers, I'm going to try to @@@@@explore@@@@@ everything this time!
^Remarkable, I don't believe I've ever encountered a barbarian as curious as you.
^Haha! I'm glad to know that even a big lizard can understand my unique character!
^That being said, remove those fire-breathers from your dungeon before I get really angry...
^And your spider webs while we're at it...
^What a pity, they are so happy to work with you...
^Boss! Here, I've put together a deck with everything this guy hates!
^Triple dose of archers and spider webs, bwahahaha !
